meanings.definition: Having or resembling a handle or loop
meanings.sent1: The ansated cup was easy to hold.
meanings.sent2: The ansated door knob was convenient to use.
meanings.sent3: The ansated umbrella looked like a fancy cane.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was ansated, reaching out to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The ansated design of the bag made it stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Shaped like a handle or loop
meanings.sent3: The ansated cloud resembled a fluffy cotton candy stick.
meanings.sent4: His ansated shadow followed him like a loyal companion.
meanings.sent5: The ansated pattern on the rug caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Having or forming a handle or loop
meanings.sent1: The ansated sword was a symbol of power.
meanings.sent2: The ansated basket was perfect for carrying fruits.
meanings.sent3: The ansated tree branch looked like a natural hook.
meanings.sent4: Her ansated hair clip kept her hair in place all day.
meanings.sent5: The ansated belt completed his outfit with style.
